means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 鲍勒绰号，酒鬼，来源于古英语，含义是“酒杯”(drinking vessel)+er

sentence.Network_en: He is the bowler-hatted figure in the foreground of Orpen's famous painting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是奥彭那幅名画中位于前景的戴圆顶硬礼帽的那个人物。

sentence.Network_en: He's a rather good fast bowler.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个非常棒的快投手。

sentence.Network_en: The bowler judged it well, timing the ball to perfection.
sentence.Network_cn: 投球手判断准确, 对球速的掌握恰到好处.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 投球手（Bowler）：擅长投球但不擅击球的球员类型；也可以指在场上进行投球的投球员。失误点（Bye）：球没有被击球员击中而直 …
3L英语单词大全 -  - 英语家园... ... alike a.相同的 bowler n.常礼帽 gentleman n.绅士.
《新目标英语》八年级（下）词汇表 ... bowl n. 碗，钵；碗状物，盆 bowler n. 打保龄球的人；(板球的)投(球)手 bowling n. 保龄球运动.
bowlegged 弯脚的bowler 玩滚球的人bowlful 一满碗

list.abs: 英国绅士过去常戴波乐帽（Bowler Hat）。这是一种硬胎圆顶呢帽，通常是黑色的，也有深灰或蓝黑的，现在很少有人戴了，但有时 …
服装专业英语 - 豆丁网 ... peak cap 女鸭舌帽 bowler hat 小礼帽 tricorn 三角帽.
“旋转投球手”（spin bowler）则投得更慢，但给予球很大的旋转使其落地后呈一定角度反弹，迫使击球手谨慎对待每一球。通常来讲旋 …
Twenty 20 Cricket Cup... ... full swing 达到活动的高潮，全力进行时 spin bowler n. 擅长投旋转球的球员 at the helm 掌权.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: named after William Bowler, the English hatter who designed it in 1850

entry.tran: （板球等运动中的）投球手，投球员
entry.def: The bowler in a sport such as cricket is the player who is bowling the ball.

example.ex: He's a rather good fast bowler.
example.tran: 他是一个非常棒的快投手。

entry.tran: 玩草地滚木球游戏的人；保龄球选手
entry.def: A bowler is someone who plays bowls or goes bowling.
A bowler is the same as a bowler hat .

means.word_mean: 1. delivers the ball to the batsman in cricket
2. rolls balls down an alley at pins
3. a hat that is round and black and hard with a narrow brim; worn by some British businessmen

sentences.en: The bowler judged it well, timing the ball to perfection.
sentences.cn: 投球手判断准确，对球速的掌握恰到好处。

sentences.en: The fielders try to retrieve the ball quickly and return it to the bowler.
sentences.cn: 外野手试图迅速接过球传给投球手。

sentences.en: The captain decided to take Snow off and try a slower bowler.
sentences.cn: 队长决定把斯诺撤下,换一个动作慢一点的投球手试一试。
